tweets.html:
What I appreciate about whoever is in charge of NBC'S live musicals is that person is also my High School drama teacher from the 90s

— John DeVore, Wellness Guru (@JohnDeVore) March 31, 2015

Shows about middle-aged women are product placement for wine.

— Emily Nussbaum (@emilynussbaum) March 31, 2015

It never crossed my mind that The Americans would not be renewed, because I would not allow it to.

— Sam Adams (@SamuelAAdams) March 31, 2015

I really would have murdered everyone on Twotter if The Americans had been cancelled. We all have our limits.

— Emily Nussbaum (@emilynussbaum) March 31, 2015

Christmas just came early for every TV critic I follow.

— Marvel's Infinity Waco (@johnwarrender) March 31, 2015

Season 4 of #TheAmericans will be a retelling of S3 from the perspective of Mail Robot.

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) March 31, 2015

Uggggggggggghhhhhhhhhhh am I going to have to try The Americans again ugggggggggggggghhhhhhhhhhhhh

— Grace (@GemOfAmara) April 1, 2015

RIP Will Gardner's tongue. #TheGoodWife pic.twitter.com/RYA1SqVRv4

— Richie (@RichieOnTV) March 31, 2015

Tyrant: A show that still exists on FX while Terriers was canceled after one season. #neverforget

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) April 1, 2015

Today gets more and more confusing. pic.twitter.com/cZgsaw55HO

— Kate Aurthur (@KateAurthur) March 31, 2015

When new hosts of comedy TV shows are being scrutinized on here like politicians we can safely say social media has ruined everything.

— andy lassner (@andylassner) March 31, 2015

By the way as of today I declare myself a comedian. Please evaluate all of my Tweets accordingly. Thank you.

— Masked Scheduler (@maskedscheduler) March 31, 2015

Solution: Trevor Noah takes over The Daily Show, but only after a six-month interregnum with Lester Holt.

— James Poniewozik (@poniewozik) March 31, 2015

Imagine using a comedian's jokes a means of assessing their comedy

— Richard Lawson (@rilaws) March 31, 2015

tweets.author_name: A Plutocrat's Head In Every Basket
tweets.html:
Like, if we're talking about comedy news shows on the air with jerks at the helm, the fact that Maher's still on HBO seems worth mention.

— A Plutocrat's Head In Every Basket (@mumbly_joe) March 31, 2015

DAILY SHOW host needed. Must be a veteran comic performer with no record of offending anyone.

— MZS (@mattzollerseitz) March 31, 2015

Jay Leno, come on down! RT @mattzollerseitz: DAILY SHOW host needed. Must be a veteran comic performer with no record of offending anyone.

— Jason Lynch (@jasonlynch) March 31, 2015

My goal is for people to read my tweets and achieve exteriorization. #goingcomedy

— Michelle Biloon (@biloon) March 31, 2015

This trevor noah situation reminds me of when walter cronkite had to explain his slash fanfic tumblr.

— Desus Nice (@desusnice) March 31, 2015

people are so upset over tweets from a comedian you'd think he drugged and raped like 40 women oh sorry we're not focusing on that this week

— Sarah Beattie (@nachosarah) March 31, 2015

the great thing about being a female comic is that it's NEVER your tweets that keep you from getting that hosting job.

— Laurie Kilmartin (@anylaurie16) March 31, 2015

Everyone upset about the Trevor Noah tweets is making me wish that George Carlin had had a Twitter account.

— Kim (@kkjordan) March 31, 2015

Boy, I really hope someone lectures me on how I need to understand comedy today.

— Bah, Handlen! (@zhandlen) April 1, 2015

"You're such a Has-Bro." Can anyone confirm that someone said this insult on Entourage? If not, why not? I ask you, why not?

— Josh Spiegel (@mousterpiece) March 31, 2015

My first thought about today's agency shakeup: It's going to be a lot harder to get into the UTA Emmy party. #PleaseDontBumpMeOffTheList

— Sarah Watson (@SarahWatson42) March 31, 2015

I think Cosby's still up for grabs in this CAA/UTA shake up

— Jon Lovett (@jonlovett) April 1, 2015

Today's episode of Community reached "Unremarkable Season 2 episode" levels, which is pretty darn good.

— Daniel Walters (@danieltwalters) April 1, 2015

All of the best #Community episodes are also quietly devastating.

— Elizabeth W. (@emwendorf) April 1, 2015

Remember: don’t believe any Firefly headlines tomorrow. Just find a quiet place to have some bao by yourself.

— Whedonesque (@whedonesque) April 1, 2015

Watching #BetterCallSaul and rooting for Jimmy is like being a fan of a really, really bad sports team (but one that tries really hard).

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) March 31, 2015

Vince Gilligan never got to tell "Fly" from the fly's perspective. Here's hoping a #BetterCallSaul episode will have Kaylee's dog as POV.

— Poe Daar-meron (@AndrewDaar) April 1, 2015

Imagine if Stringer Bell had hired Jimmy McGill to set up B&B.#BetterCallSaul

— Poe Daar-meron (@AndrewDaar) April 1, 2015

Pretty sure either Vikings, Wolf Hall & Game of Thrones have employed every adult male actor in UK or Ireland with a beard.

— Mo Ryan (@moryan) April 1, 2015

#YoungerTV takes a bold chance when it has the 40ish female protagonist drink WHITE wine

— Michael Newman (@mznewman) April 1, 2015

That. Fight. Scene. Was. Incredible. REWIND! #TheFlash

— Jarett Wieselman (@JarettSays) April 1, 2015

Mark Hamill is aaaaawwwweeeesssssoooommmeeeee. #TheFlash

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) April 1, 2015

The way this scene is going, I expect Barry to envision things from The Trickster 2.0's POV & say "This is my design." #TheFlash #Hannibal

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) April 1, 2015

"You don't know Mason like I do." NONE OF US KNOW HIM, IRIS. #TheFlash

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) April 1, 2015

Everything but the GAWD AWFUL 90s outfit. We didn't know any better back then. #TheFlash

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) April 1, 2015

Barry, it's called "subtle". TRY IT SOMETIME. #TheFlash

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) April 1, 2015

Flash: "Why are we meeting here?"

Iris: "We need to use the set in this episode."#TheFlash #DatFlash

— Blerdman (@Blerd_Man) April 1, 2015

tweets.author_name: Con Solo, Dodging Last Jedi Spoilers
tweets.html:
So he's out of prison one day & gets a haircut, but Oliver's been off the Island for a year and he hasn't got a haircut?!? #TheFlash #Arrow

— Con Solo, Dodging Last Jedi Spoilers (@ConStar24) April 1, 2015

I guess they get Netflix in jail? #TheFlash

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) April 1, 2015

SEASON FIVE of Breaking Bad is the best one? Now you know the Trickster is evil. #TheFlash

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) April 1, 2015

That just tells you how great BREAKING BAD is. Even prison inmates like The Trickster will do anything to watch it. #DatFlash #TheFlash

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) April 1, 2015

THEY DID -NOT- GIVE HIM THAT LINE. NO. NO. DO NOT LIKE. #TheFlash

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) April 1, 2015

"HEY, DAMMIT, THAT'S MY LINE!!"- Jmaes Earl Jones watching #TheFlash at home #DatFlash

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) April 1, 2015

I JUST FELL OUT ON THE FLOOR IN A NERDGASM. #TheFlash

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) April 1, 2015

Cheesy, beautiful, perfect. Holy crap Hamill got to say the line people have been spending decades saying to him. #TheFlash #FanVFan

— Andrew Ivimey (@Ivimey) April 1, 2015

I WILL NOT spoil that line because West Coast should have the same NERDGASM I just did. #TheFlash

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) April 1, 2015

The laugh is 8/10ths of the Joker laugh. Just enough to be terrifying, small enough to be different. #TheFlash #FanVFan

— Andrew Ivimey (@Ivimey) April 1, 2015

Whaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa?????? HOLY CRAP. #TheFlash is BALLS OUT COMIC BOOK CRA CRA FUN tonight.

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) April 1, 2015

"You always did look good in red." #TheFlash home of the coolest fathers on TV.

— Uncredited Rewrite (@UncredRewrite) April 1, 2015

#TheFlash is just operating on a whole other level in the back-half of S1. That Harrison reveal was NEXT LEVEL. These writers are brilliant

— Jarett Wieselman (@JarettSays) April 1, 2015

JUST PUT YOUR FACE ON A BILLBOARD, BARRY, IT'LL SAVE YOU SOME TROUBLE #TheFlash

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) April 1, 2015

Thank goodness #TheFlash got around to doing all of this about a year and a half before #Arrow did.

— Whitney McIntosh (@WhitneyM02) April 1, 2015

Breaking Bad, Star Wars, Meatloaf, Fringe. too many references!!! #TheFlash

— Uncredited Rewrite (@UncredRewrite) April 1, 2015

#TheFlash is operating like they're not expecting a season two and it's pretty awesome.

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) April 1, 2015

Mom to me: you got all these men lying to you and you feeding them. They need to starve. #TheFlash

— Candice Patton (@candicekp) April 1, 2015

THAT PREVIEW. Damn. #TheFlash

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) April 1, 2015

Ok I think I'm about to pass out from this sneak peek. WOW. #TheFlash

— ReBecca Theodore-Vachon (@FilmFatale_NYC) April 1, 2015

WHY YOU NOT PLAYING FAIR #TheFlash?! THIS CANT STILL BE SEASON ONE

— Millie Rock Bobby Brown (@WoundGod) April 1, 2015

How is that season preview for #TheFlash as entertaining, if not more so, as the trailer for any big-budget summer blockbuster? #DatFlash

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) April 1, 2015

#TheFlash promo for rest of the season just made my brain go BOOM with another NERDGASM.

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) April 1, 2015

Mark Hamill is delightful. Hopefully we can mark 2015 as year one of the Hamillaissance, leading to Oscar-winning President Hamill.

— Christopher Dole (@chrisdole86) April 1, 2015

Jemma Simmons is a badass. Pass it on. #AgentsofSHIELD

— Krampus Sammi Rose (@SamRoseWatson) April 1, 2015

Fox told us we could not show the side of a buttock on television, but ABC showed this on DWTS: pic.twitter.com/4fsGhpXc9a

— Andy Bobrow (@abobrow) April 1, 2015

Fox constantly tells us, "If we air this, we will be fined or lose our license." I assume ABC lost their broadcast license for this then?

— Andy Bobrow (@abobrow) April 1, 2015

Seriously, #FindingCarter? No.

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) April 1, 2015

I hate all of this. #FindingCarter

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) April 1, 2015

@TVandDinners ALL OF IT. (Except Max’s face and hair.)

— Melissa Mann (@PhantomRat) April 1, 2015

Amazing. #CougarTown pic.twitter.com/T7nZSF4QUB

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) April 1, 2015

Aw, #sunshinestate, we'll miss ya!

— leahshafer (@leahshafer) April 1, 2015

I want to make a BIG GAY scarf out of Jules' dress tonight. #CougarTown #OneLastPour

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) April 1, 2015

Christa Miller damn near just killed me. #CougarTown

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) April 1, 2015

Justfied is really good tonight. [repeat every Tuesday for two weeks, then replace with eternal sobs]

— Sam Adams (@SamuelAAdams) March 31, 2015

How has no one killed this grody toilet baby Boon yet, my god, I need a shower every time he comes onscreen. Not in the good way. #Justified

— Oriana Schwindt (@Schwindter) April 1, 2015

Boyd Crowder, you magnificent bastard. #Justified

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) April 1, 2015

why do people keep trying to stop boyd crowder from ruling shit

why

— BUM CHILLUPS (@edsbs) April 1, 2015

No seriously. Everybody Hates Nelson. Coming Fall 2016 to FX, if Landgraf & Co know what's good for 'em. #Justified

— Oriana Schwindt (@Schwindter) April 1, 2015

How many of Wynn Duffy's phone calls begin with "I'm not sure where to start" do you think? #Justified

— Oriana Schwindt (@Schwindter) April 1, 2015

Holy...

...fucking...

...shit.

If that isn't a sign of true friendship & loyalty, I don't know WHAT the hell is. #Justified

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) April 1, 2015

Boyd in a Sheriff's uniform gives me a tingly feeling I don't entirely understand. #Justified

— Oriana Schwindt (@Schwindter) April 1, 2015
